mdRecord.dcterms:description: Original Italianate design by T. R. Kimball opened 1898. Remodeled 1929-1930 to Classical Revival design; exterior remodeled again 1954. Closed 1974. Purchased 2013 by Hearst Television for KETV broadcast facility, remodeled 2013-2015. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Omaha_station_(Chicago,_Burlington_and_Quincy_Railroad) [work]
